metadata.name: New World Access Card - Black #1
metadata.description: An exclusive NFT collection of 175 utility-based access cards to kick off the New World. These access cards range from three different rarities, each holding different utilities. Each card gives holders a list of different rewards, such as early access, whitelists and merch to our future projects, free passes to New World events, and a community of holders alike on Discord and Twitter. You wonâ€™t want to miss this.
